title: Add metrics history graphs to the Admin UI
description:
Metrics history collected using the framework in SOLR-11779 can be presented in the Admin UI as per-collection and node / jvm graphs.

For each collected metric there are several time-series available, each covering a different time period and with different resolution:

	last 4 hours, 1 min resolution
	last 48 hours, 10 min resolution
	last 2 weeks, 1h resolution
	last 2 months, 4h resolution
	last 1 year, 1 day resolution



This issue may also involve adding more configuration parameters for better control of the output and look & feel of graphs produced with /admin/metrics/history?format=graph.
